The donated laptop needs to be tagged and labelled with its unique Labdoo ID number for easiness of tracing its parts and location.
Following is the steps how to tag a Labdoo laptop.
1. Login to www.labdoo.org 2. You need to "Login" (top right of the page) in order to tag a laptop 3. On the top pull-down menu, select "Dootronics" -> "Tag it!" 4. Fill the laptop information (You have to answer all the fields ended with a "*") 6. It's very important to add the laptop donor's email address to ensure they can receive the status of the laptop. Here's how - Under Create Dootronic, select the second tab "Additional Information" - Scroll down to Additional notification emails - Fill the donor's email address here. 7. Click "Save" once you are done. An unique Labdoo ID number will be assigned to the laptop. 8. You can click on "Print tags" to print the "Labdoo ID" labels or write the Labdoo ID number on the preprint blank label sheets. (https://www.labdoo.org/sites/default/files/content/labdoo-toolkit/labdoo-laptop_id_labels.pdf) 9. Tape the labels to laptop, its power adaptor, and all the parts which came with the laptop.
